model.name: Web4 Component Comprehensive Build Chain Requirements
model.title: Web4 Component Comprehensive Build Chain Requirements
model.description: Each Web4 component shell starter script must trigger a complete automated build chain that resolves all dependencies, builds components in correct order, and ensures executable state without manual component-by-component building. Build system must handle dependency resolution, environment validation, and build orchestration transparently for seamless Web4 component execution experience.
